data.actual_result: The circles will either all become boxes, or the middle circle becomes a box
data.expected_result: The circles all stay as circles
data.short_description: Circles in the typing indicators in the member list become misshapen on 90 zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to 90 - Go to a server where a lot of people are typing - Observe the typing indicators in the member list
